item.description:
This month's topic will be - Fun With Hypnosis!

Hypnosis can be a very serious and helpful tool.  There is a lot of great changes that can be done through hypnosis.  There is also some very interesting and fun things that can be done.

We will discuss topics like stage shows, regression, using pendulums, vivid visualization.

Like usual, we will have at least one exercise where everyone gets a chance to experience safe hypnosis in some form.

Bring your imagination and let's have fun.

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Boston Hypnosis and NLP Meetup - Lexington-Fun WIth Hypnosis
